# [Interview #12: Letter to Carolyn F., Entry #2](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=12#2)

#### Robert Jordan

With best wishes,

I am,

Sincerely,

Robert Jordan

#### Footnote

This letter was typewritten; see source link for a 'faithful' presentation of the letter.
